column1: Kata Robata////In terms of the food - this place never disappoints.  My friends ordered the duck dumpling ramen
column3: and I ordered the Rising Sun roll and some fresh salmon sushi.  They loved the ramen
column4: and I loved my sushi - everyone was happy.  :) The peppered tuna was perfect with the truffle vinaigrette
column5: and the salmon sushi was melt-in-your-mouth awesome.  For those with a gluten free allergy
column6: this place definitely accommodates you.  You'd be surprised to find gluten lurking in soy sauce
column10: etc... so this place labels their menu to depict whether or not it's gluten free.  They even have gluten free soy sauce; just remember to ask for it.
